long_description: Round up your usual suspects and go have fun in the sun. The men's Julbo Suspect Sunglasses give you the protection you need along with the look you want. Spectron 3+ polycarbonate lenses block 88% of visible light and 100% of UV rays. Mirror effect on the lenses improves visible light filtering. Polycarbonate lenses are lightweight yet offer excellent shatter resistance. Julbo Suspect Sunglasses come with a protective case.
short_description: Round up your usual suspects and go have fun in the sun. The men's Julbo Suspect Sunglasses give you the protection you need along with the look you want.
